resources.string: - When clicking on the screen, your bird will fly up 1 segment. Cleverly control your bird to fly through the slots holding the obstacles
- If your bird flies too high or too low or hits the obstacles, the game will immediately stop and end.
- Every time you successfully pass an obstacle, you will get 1 point. Try to pass as much as possible to earn as many points
- If you find the game too easy, try increasing the difficulty by checking the difficulty box and choosing a higher difficulty to experience the game at a different level.
- Sometimes you want to review your scores and other players? Please select the high score box to review your achievements as well as other players!

- Swipe the number tiles on the chessboard in one direction (top, bottom, left and right) to collect all the number tiles in that direction. If the number tiles are pulled in the same direction but have the same value and are next to each other, they will combine to form a new number whose value is the sum of those 2 cells and give you a score equal to the value of the newly created cell

- After each swipe of the number cells, when the number cells have been added together and dragged in the specified direction, there will be 1-2 new numbers created in the empty cells. The value of those tiles will be changed when you customize the difficulty of the game

- In the main interface of the game, you can click on the difficulty box to change the difficulty for the game. The higher the difficulty, the higher the value of the newly born numbers will be, specifically as follows:
+ Easy: 1 or 2 cells appear with a value of 2
+ Medium: Appears from 1 to 2 cells with a value of 2 or 4
+ Difficult: Occurs from 1 to 2 squares with a value of 2,4 or 8
- Sometimes you want to review your scores and other players? Please select the high score box to review your achievements as well as other players!
- At the beginning of the game, you will have 1 time to read and give your answer. Click on the answer box and wait for the game to give the correct answer
- For each correct answer, you will get 5 points. If you choose the wrong one or run out of time, the game will immediately end
- In the main interface of the game, you can click on the difficulty box to change the difficulty for the game. The higher the difficulty, the lower the time, specifically as follows:
- Sometimes you want to review your scores and other players? Please select the high score box to review your achievements as well as other players!
- Sometimes the number of questions is too small for you to experience the difficulty of the game, you can suggest more questions to the game administrator and download more questions
+ 50/50: Randomly remove 2 wrong answers (can only be used once)
+ Skip: Skip the question and get the score of the skip question (can only be used once)
+ Change: Allows you to change the question, but will not receive the score for that question (can only be used once)
